title: Track Competitive Intelligence
description: A competitive intelligence analyst needs to track and summarize recent news and clinical trial updates for a competitor's drug.

tasks.description: Scan news feeds, press releases, and clinical trial registries for mentions of the competitor drug.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a press release announcing the competitor has started a new Phase 2 trial.
Agent writes a concise summary of the new trial's indication and design.

tasks.description: Create a competitive intelligence alert and distribute it to the relevant internal teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts and sends an alert to the product strategy team.
